text: Per Arne Åhman (4 February 1925 – 5 July 2022) was a Swedish athlete. He won the triple jump event at the 1948 Summer Olympics.Arne Åhman. sports- reference.com ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swedish athletes Category:Triple jumpers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden
title: Arne Åhman
